summary: This bill, S.1254, amends the Aquifer Recharge Flexibility Act to clarify provisions related to water conveyances for aquifer recharge. It modifies existing rules regarding the use of rights-of-way, easements, and permits for aquifer recharge purposes, allowing entities like states and tribes to utilize them without additional authorization under certain conditions. It also introduces notice requirements to the Bureau of Land Management and exempts such uses from additional rent, unless for-profit use is involved.  The bill also clarifies exemptions from certain environmental laws and clarifies what is not authorized.
